S.FORM: nasuljivat mun. tucu uri patagilj a nga itjen.
nasoljivat mon. toco ori patagilj a nga itjen.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。現在我們要開始了。
Hello everyone. Now we are going to start.

S.FORM: gacalju! sukubi!
gacaljo! sokobi!
nasuljivat sun sinsi.
nasoljivat son sinsi.
pai qiladju.
pai qiladjo.
nasuljivat mun. tucu uri temulu ti sinsi tjanumun tua kemuda a qivu ta lami na kacalisiyan.
nasoljivat mon. toco ori temolo ti sinsi tjanomon toa kemoda a qivo ta lami na kacalisiyan.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的排灣語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say Paiwan for food.

S.FORM: pulingalingav mun ta kai ni sinsi?
polingalingav mon ta kai ni sinsi?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: sinsi, inika ken a pulingalingav. makaya sun a qivu a kingtalj anga?
sinsi, inika ken a polingalingav. makaya son a qivo a kingtalj anga?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: inika ken a lemangdanda, makaya pasiqaca a pagalju?
inika ken a lemangdanda, makaya pasiqaca a pagaljo?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: pai pacunu a pasa maza! kisaseljangu tjanuaken a semupu.
pai pacono a pasa maza! kisaseljango tjanoaken a semopo.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡!跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: pariya a su sinupuan.
pariya a so sinopoan.
supu-u a kingtalj anga. pai pasiqaca-u.
sopo-o a kingtalj anga. pai pasiqaca-o.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: pai maliceng. maya qivu.
pai maliceng. maya qivo.
pai alapu ta nu sunat.
pai alapo ta no sonat.
ui, sinsi.
oi, sinsi.
alapu ta nu inpic.
alapo ta no inpic.
sinsi, malim anga ken a kemacu ta ku inpic.
sinsi, malim anga ken a kemaco ta ko inpic.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: alapu ta nu si'uli'ulip.
alapo ta no si'oli'olip.
sinsi, malim anga ken a kemacu ta si'uli'ulip.
sinsi, malim anga ken a kemaco ta si'oli'olip.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: kisedjamu tjai tjaqedjiqedji a su salasaladj.
kisedjamo tjai tjaqedjiqedji a so salasaladj.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: pasedjami aken ta su siquliqulip?
pasedjami aken ta so siqoliqolip?
siputidetideqan anga zikan tua tja kitulu.
sipotidetideqan anga zikan toa tja kitolo.
tja patjemaza-u a tja kitulu, cevucevungi anga nu tjaivililj.
tja patjemaza-o a tja kitolo, cevocevongi anga no tjaivililj.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: tima sun?
tima son?
ti kui aken.
ti koi aken.
tima sun?
tima son?
aljak aken ni masegseg, ti kui aken.
aljak aken ni masegseg, ti koi aken.
S.TRANSL: I am masegseg’s son, my name is kui.

S.FORM: tima sun?
tima son?
situ aken ni masegseg, ti kui aken.
sito aken ni masegseg, ti koi aken.
S.TRANSL: I am a student of tjanubak, my name is kui.

S.FORM: tima a su ngadan?
tima a so ngadan?
ti kui a ku ngadan.
ti koi a ko ngadan.
tima a ngadan ni tjama?
tima a ngadan ni tjama?
tjanubak a ngadan ni kama.
tjanobak a ngadan ni kama.
tima timadju? ti baru timadju.
tima timadjo? ti baro timadjo.
S.TRANSL: Who is he? He is baru.

S.FORM: ku kaka timadju, ti camak timadju.
ko kaka timadjo, ti camak timadjo.
S.TRANSL: He’s my brother, his name is camak.

S.FORM: tima ngadan nimadju?
tima ngadan nimadjo?
ti kui a ngadan nimadju.
ti koi a ngadan nimadjo.
ti camak a ngadan nimadju?
ti camak a ngadan nimadjo?
ui, ti camak a ngadan nimadju.
oi, ti camak a ngadan nimadjo.
ti camak a ngadan nimadju? ini, ti kui a ngadan nimadju.
ti camak a ngadan nimadjo? ini, ti koi a ngadan nimadjo.
S.TRANSL: 他的名字是camak嗎?不是，他的名字是kui。
Is his name camak? No, his name is Kui.

S.FORM: tima zua cawcau?
tima zoa cawcao?
ti pales timadju. ti kina i pales.
ti pales timadjo. ti kina i pales.
S.TRANSL: She’s pales. she’s my aunt pales.

S.FORM: tima azua cawcau?
tima azoa cawcao?
ku drava timadju, ti muni a ngadan nimadju.
ko drava timadjo, ti moni a ngadan nimadjo.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是muni。
She is my friend, her name is muni.

S.FORM: pida nga a su cavilj?
pida nga a so cavilj?
tapuluq anga a ku cavilj.
tapoloq anga a ko cavilj.
pida nga a cavilj nimadju?
pida nga a cavilj nimadjo?
tapuluq katu drusa a cavilj nimadju.
tapoloq kato drosa a cavilj nimadjo.
pidanga a cavilj ni tjama?
pidanga a cavilj ni tjama?
lima a puluq a cavilj ni kama.
lima a poloq a cavilj ni kama.
mapida a su vetjek?
mapida a so vetjek?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: izua madrusa tia kaka kata ku kaka a macidjilj.
izoa madrosa tia kaka kata ko kaka a macidjilj.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: izua su kaka a uqaljay?
izoa so kaka a oqaljay?
neka a ku kaka a uqaljay.
neka a ko kaka a oqaljay.
mapida mun a tacekeljan?
mapida mon a tacekeljan?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: man sepatj amen a tacekeljan.
man sepatj amen a tacekeljan.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: inu sun a semupusupu?
ino son a semoposopo?
i Takau aken a semupusupu.
i Takao aken a semoposopo.
tima timadju?
tima timadjo?
ti kama i camak.
ti kama i camak.
anema a sengsengan ni tjama i kui?
anema a sengsengan ni tjama i koi?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅kui從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle Kui do for a living?

S.FORM: kisacu timadju.
kisaco timadjo.
tima azua?
tima azoa?
ti kaka azua.
ti kaka azoa.
izua a sengsengan ni su kaka?
izoa a sengsengan ni so kaka?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: i biuing timadju a masengsengseng.
i bioing timadjo a masengsengseng.
marevetek tiamadju a madrusa?
marevetek tiamadjo a madrosa?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: ini, maredrava tiamadju.
ini, maredrava tiamadjo.
kacalisian sun?
kacalisian son?
ui, paiwan zuku aken a kacalisian.
oi, paiwan zoko aken a kacalisian.
S.TRANSL: 是，我是排灣族的原住民。
Yes, I am an aboriginal of the Paiwan tribe.

S.FORM: kacalisian a su cekelj?
kacalisian a so cekelj?
ini, se Rekai timadju.
ini, se Rekai timadjo.
'aca'aca ti tjama?
'aca'aca ti tjama?
ui, tiamen a tacekeljan 'aca'aca amen a mapuljat.
oi, tiamen a tacekeljan 'aca'aca amen a mapoljat.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: kitulutulu anga a su kaka i gakku?
kitolotolo anga a so kaka i gakko?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: ui, kitulutulu anga i gakku timadju.
oi, kitolotolo anga i gakko timadjo.
macaqu a kemacalisianan a su kaka?
macaqo a kemacalisianan a so kaka?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: ui macaqu a kemacalisianan tiamadju.
oi macaqo a kemacalisianan tiamadjo.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: mapida a su vetek?
mapida a so vetek?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: man tjelulj a ku vetek.
man tjelolj a ko vetek.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: nakiteveljan sun ta su matjaljaljak?
nakiteveljan son ta so matjaljaljak?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: ui, nakiteveljan aken ta ku matjaljaljak.
oi, nakiteveljan aken ta ko matjaljaljak.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: nakitateveljan sun tjai su vuvu?
nakitateveljan son tjai so vovo?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: ini, inika ken a nakitateveljan tjaimadju.
ini, inika ken a nakitateveljan tjaimadjo.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn’t live with them.

S.FORM: na kitevaljan sun tjaima?
na kitevaljan son tjaima?
nakiteveljan aken tjai kama kina kaka a uqaljay.
nakiteveljan aken tjai kama kina kaka a oqaljay.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: kemasinu sun?
kemasino son?
kemasi takau aken.
kemasi takao aken.
inu a nu umaq?
ino a no omaq?
i Rinari a nia umaq.
i Rinari a nia omaq.
inu a su qinaljan?
ino a so qinaljan?
a ku qinaljan i Takau.
a ko qinaljan i Takao.
inu a nu qinaljan?
ino a no qinaljan?
a nia qinaljan i Takau.
a nia qinaljan i Takao.
nungida vaik sun a sema qinaljan?
nongida vaik son a sema qinaljan?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: nu pulavalavay tua kaljazalanzangan vaik aken sa kamaya.
no polavalavay toa kaljazalanzangan vaik aken sa kamaya.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: aljak aken nua paiwan zuku.
aljak aken noa paiwan zoko.
namakuda a kinaqadavan a vuaq.
namakoda a kinaqadavan a voaq.
tevuta anga a qadav, nazalangzan a kinaqadavan.
tevota anga a qadav, nazalangzan a kinaqadavan.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: vucelelj a i sasaw?
vocelelj a i sasaw?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: vucelelj aravac, itungu a pakaliyav.
vocelelj aravac, itongo a pakaliyav.
S.TRANSL: It's very cold, so wear lots of clothes.

S.FORM: zalanzang a i sasaw?
zalanzang a i sasaw?
ini, venalivali anga, napevucelelj.
ini, venalivali anga, napevocelelj.
namakuda a kinaqadavan a vuaq?
namakoda a kinaqadavan a voaq?
tucu a vuaq inika vucelelj inika zalangzang, nasulapelj.
toco a voaq inika vocelelj inika zalangzang, nasolapelj.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: tucu a vengin namakuda a kinaqadavan?
toco a vengin namakoda a kinaqadavan?
neka nu qerepus i kalevelevan, tevutavuta a qiljas.
neka no qerepos i kalevelevan, tevotavota a qiljas.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: namakuda a kinaqadavan i sasaw?
namakoda a kinaqadavan i sasaw?
tjau meljay a qadav kasawni, maqadav anga, tevutanga a 'uljivangeraw.
tjao meljay a qadav kasawni, maqadav anga, tevotanga a 'oljivangeraw.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: namakuda a kinaqadavan izua i tjanusun?
namakoda a kinaqadavan izoa i tjanoson?
S.TRANSL: What's the weather like where you are?

S.FORM: venalivali a imaza i tjanuamen.
venalivali a imaza i tjanoamen.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: azua kinaqadavan i tjanusun namakuda?
azoa kinaqadavan i tjanoson namakoda?
nangua' aravac, macenglanglaw.
nangoa' aravac, macenglanglaw.
S.TRANSL: Good, the sun is coming out.

S.FORM: uri sema gakku anga ken.
ori sema gakko anga ken.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: vucelelj a kinaqadavan, itung ngu a pakaliyav.
vocelelj a kinaqadavan, itong ngo a pakaliyav.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: uri vaik anga ken a sema masasaw.
ori vaik anga ken a sema masasaw.
nusauni palj'aca a qemudjalj, paqenetju anga kemacu ta qausua.
nosaoni palj'aca a qemodjalj, paqenetjo anga kemaco ta qaosoa.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: uri qemudjalj?
ori qemodjalj?
nazemung kasauni, tjara qemudjalj nusauni.
nazemong kasaoni, tjara qemodjalj nosaoni.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: qemudjaqudjalj anga?
qemodjaqodjalj anga?
qemudjalj anga?
qemodjalj anga?
namaya ta naqemudjalj anga, teveteveng a djalan.
namaya ta naqemodjalj anga, teveteveng a djalan.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: naqemudjalj? aku saljeveljever a su kinacavacavan?
naqemodjalj? ako saljeveljever a so kinacavacavan?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: qemudjaqudjalj a i sasaw, inika ken a namasi qausua.
qemodjaqodjalj a i sasaw, inika ken a namasi qaosoa.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: nasuljivat anan sun?
nasoljivat anan son?
kudral a vali, saqetju a ku qulu ta vinalian.
kodral a vali, saqetjo a ko qolo ta vinalian.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: nasarenguaq anan sun?
nasarengoaq anan son?
paramur a qadav, malingac a ku qulu ta kinirasian.
paramor a qadav, malingac a ko qolo ta kinirasian.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: malim anga ken a kemacu ta ku inpic.
malim anga ken a kemaco ta ko inpic.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: ku pasedjamay.
ko pasedjamay.
malim anga ken a kemacu ta ku qecap.
malim anga ken a kemaco ta ko qecap.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: inika ken a nakemacu, vaiki a kiveli.
inika ken a nakemaco, vaiki a kiveli.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: makaya vaik itjen a kiveli ta inpic?
makaya vaik itjen a kiveli ta inpic?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: ui, uri veneli anan aken ta si'uli'ulip.
oi, ori veneli anan aken ta si'oli'olip.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: ari vaiki a kiveli ta kenamain?
ari vaiki a kiveli ta kenamain?
S.TRANSL: Come on, let's go get some breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: caqen, nakeman anga ken i tjumaq.
caqen, nakeman anga ken i tjomaq.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: malim anga ken a semljec ta ku bintu.
malim anga ken a semljec ta ko binto.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: pakirimu a vaik a semljec.
pakirimo a vaik a semljec.
malim anga ken a kemacu ta ku bintu.
malim anga ken a kemaco ta ko binto.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: pai kani a madrua ta ku bintu.
pai kani a madroa ta ko binto.
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: uri anema su kanen nu kingcengecengelj?
ori anema so kanen no kingcengecengelj?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: keman aken ta cengelj i gakku.
keman aken ta cengelj i gakko.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: anema uri su kanen nu kincengelj?
anema ori so kanen no kincengelj?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: nakemacu aken ta bintu, kanianga madrusa.
nakemaco aken ta binto, kanianga madrosa.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: ari, vaiki a benuru?
ari, vaiki a benoro?
S.TRANSL: Come on, let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: pariya! ari vaiki.
pariya! ari vaiki.
ari vaiki a benuru?
ari vaiki a benoro?
caqen, uri semupu aken.
caqen, ori semopo aken.
alapan aken ta ljaljumay.
alapan aken ta ljaljomay.
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: ui, ku sipavayan tjanusun aicu a ljaljumay.
oi, ko sipavayan tjanoson aico a ljaljomay.
S.TRANSL: Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: pai alapan aken ta zuking?
pai alapan aken ta zoking?
S.TRANSL: Can you get me a rag, please?

S.FORM: semuasuap aken, alapan aken ayau ti kui.
semoasoap aken, alapan aken ayao ti koi.
S.TRANSL: I'm sweeping the floor, you ask Kui to help you.

S.FORM: makasuapanga sun?
makasoapanga son?
makasuapanga ken.
makasoapanga ken.
aku sun a inika semuap?
ako son a inika semoap?
makasuapanga ken.
makasoapanga ken.
qiljaqiljan aicu a kasintan, sau zukinguanan.
qiljaqiljan aico a kasintan, sao zokingoanan.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: ui, vaik aken a malap ta zuking.
oi, vaik aken a malap ta zoking.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: qiljaqiljan azua 'ezung, sau zukinguanan.
qiljaqiljan azoa 'ezong, sao zokingoanan.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: mayanan, ini anan aku makasuap tai maza.
mayanan, ini anan ako makasoap tai maza.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: uri kemuda sun nusauni?
ori kemoda son nosaoni?
uri vaik aken a karim tjai sinsi.
ori vaik aken a karim tjai sinsi.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: nu nakemasi gakku sun uri kemudad sun?
no nakemasi gakko son ori kemodad son?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: uri vaik amen kata ku salasalad a semenay.
ori vaik amen kata ko salasalad a semenay.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: nu nakemasi gakku timadju uri kemuda?
no nakemasi gakko timadjo ori kemoda?
uri vaik a ljemanguy timadju.
ori vaik a ljemangoy timadjo.
i tjumaq ti ljavaus?
i tjomaq ti ljavaos?
i tjumaq, pai tjumaq-u.
i tjomaq, pai tjomaq-o.
S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.

S.FORM: i tjumaq ti ljavaus?
i tjomaq ti ljavaos?
S.TRANSL: May I ask if Ljavaus is at home?

S.FORM: neka i tjumaq, anemaya sun?
neka i tjomaq, anemaya son?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She’s not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: tima zua?
tima zoa?
vuvu, ti pales aken suqeljevi a paljing.
vovo, ti pales aken soqeljevi a paljing.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, I’m pales please open the door.

S.FORM: tima sun?
tima son?
patagaw, ti pales aken, muri kivangavang aken tjanusun.
patagaw, ti pales aken, mori kivangavang aken tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: patagaw, I’m pales, I’ve come to play with you.

S.FORM: cuacuay anga itjen a inika mecevang.
coacoay anga itjen a inika mecevang.
ui lja! nasinglit aken tjanusun. pai kelju pasalinglingliti.
oi lja! nasinglit aken tjanoson. pai keljo pasalinglingliti.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let’s chat!

S.FORM: qiladju, tekelu ta quciya.
qiladjo, tekelo ta qociya.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: maljimalji.
maljimalji.
tekelu ta quciya.
tekelo ta qociya.
u! sanguaq aravc a nu quciya.
o! sangoaq aravc a no qociya.
kelju kani ta kudamunu!
keljo kani ta kodamono!
ui! napesanguaq nutjapacunan aicu a kudamunu.
oi! napesangoaq notjapaconan aico a kodamono.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很美味。

S.FORM: sanguaq aicu a kudamunu?
sangoaq aico a kodamono?
ui, sanguaq aravac.
oi, sangoaq aravac.
nakemesa anga ti kina ta kaiven, kelju kanu!
nakemesa anga ti kina ta kaiven, keljo kano!
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

S.FORM: ui, vaik aken a pilima.
oi, vaik aken a pilima.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: kanu a pakaliyav, ini sun a 'ali'ali.
kano a pakaliyav, ini son a 'ali'ali.
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you’re not an outsider.

S.FORM: liyav anga ku kinan, mavetu anga ken aravac.
liyav anga ko kinan, maveto anga ken aravac.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了很多，已經非常飽了。
I ate a lot, I was very full.

S.FORM: kanu a pakaliyav, maya masiya.
kano a pakaliyav, maya masiya.
ui, sanguaq aravac.
oi, sangoaq aravac.
uri vaik anga ken, ku ljizavau anga sun nutjaivililj.
ori vaik anga ken, ko ljizavao anga son notjaivililj.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，下次再來看你。
I’m leaving, I’ll see you next time.

S.FORM: ui, cevucevungi anga nutjaivalilj.
oi, cevocevongi anga notjaivalilj.
salilim anga, vaik anga ken a tjumaq.
salilim anga, vaik anga ken a tjomaq.
S.TRANSL: 已經很晚了，我要回家了。

S.FORM: kelju anga kivala nutjaivililj.
keljo anga kivala notjaivililj.
galju anga i djalan.
galjo anga i djalan.
ui, nu izua su zikang kelju anga a kivangavang.
oi, no izoa so zikang keljo anga a kivangavang.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: nasuljivat mun. tucu a vuaq uri kemacu ti sinsi tjanumun a sema qinaljan a kivadaq ta vavulungan.
nasoljivat mon. toco a voaq ori kemaco ti sinsi tjanomon a sema qinaljan a kivadaq ta vavolongan.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去部落訪問耆老。
Hello everyone, today I’m taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: pai pariya! uri kiqaqivuan amen ta vavulungan tua pinayuanan a kai.
pai pariya! ori kiqaqivoan amen ta vavolongan toa pinayoanan a kai.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!我們要跟耆老說排灣語。
Okay! We have to speak Paiwanese to the seniors.

S.FORM: palamu anga itjen a djemaljun?
palamo anga itjen a djemaljon?
palamu anga djemaljun.
palamo anga djemaljon.
vuvu, mangtjez amen a ljemizav tjanusun.
vovo, mangtjez amen a ljemizav tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, we’ve come to see you.

S.FORM: na! manu macaqu mun a kemacalisianan a qivu ayau! qa! pai pariyangata!
na! mano macaqo mon a kemacalisianan a qivo ayao! qa! pai pariyangata!
S.TRANSL: 你們會說排灣語啊!真是太棒了!
You guys speak Paiwanese! That’s great!

S.FORM: nasuljivat mun. tucu a vuaq uri kacuin mun ni sinsi a sema puvaquan a masengseng.
nasoljivat mon. toco a voaq ori kacoin mon ni sinsi a sema povaqoan a masengseng.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去小米田工作。
Hello everyone, today I will take you to work in the millet field.

S.FORM: ui, sinsi.
oi, sinsi.
kelju samazau a matjatjiljitiljv, pa'enetju anga kemacu ta nuturivecan.
keljo samazao a matjatjiljitiljv, pa'enetjo anga kemaco ta notorivecan.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: ui sinsi, nia inalapanga a nia turivecan.
oi sinsi, nia inalapanga a nia torivecan.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we’ve got our tools.

S.FORM: djemaljun anga itjen?
djemaljon anga itjen?
ini anan cadja anan.
ini anan cadja anan.
S.TRANSL: Not yet, it’s still far away.

S.FORM: vaiku a pazaljum.
vaiko a pazaljom.
ui, tiaken nay a puzaljum.
oi, tiaken nay a pozaljom.
sau alapu ta sizazazazaw.
sao alapo ta sizazazazaw.
S.TRANSL: You go get the bird catcher.

S.FORM: ui, vaik aken a zemazaw.
oi, vaik aken a zemazaw.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: nasuljivat mun. tucu uri vaik itjen a sema zua itua kakataliduan tua 'emuzi'uzip.
nasoljivat mon. toco ori vaik itjen a sema zoa itoa kakatalidoan toa 'emozi'ozip.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，我們今天要去動物園。
Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: aicu a pariya! aki anema uri tja pakazuanan a sema zua ayau?
aico a pariya! aki anema ori tja pakazoanan a sema zoa ayao?
S.TRANSL: 好棒喔!我們要怎麼去呢?
Awesome! How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: tjevavav itjen ta basu a sema zua.
tjevavav itjen ta baso a sema zoa.
matatiljitiljivu, uri padulu-i anga itjen a kiveli ta kipu.
matatiljitiljivo, ori padolo-i anga itjen a kiveli ta kipo.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們準備買票。
Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: ui.
oi.
a i tjaiqayav mareka qayaqayam, a i tjailikuz mareka 'atjuvi, talidu a kisumadju.
a i tjaiqayav mareka qayaqayam, a i tjailikoz mareka 'atjovi, talido a kisomadjo.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: sinsi marekut aken ta 'atjuvi.
sinsi marekot aken ta 'atjovi.
inika makuda, sau pacunu ta 'aya'ayam.
inika makoda, sao pacono ta 'aya'ayam.
S.TRANSL: It doesn’t matter, then you go and watch the birds.

S.FORM: nu djemaljun ta icizikang pangtjez-i anga ki'epuan.
no djemaljon ta icizikang pangtjez-i anga ki'epoan.
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來集合。
We’ll be back in an hour.

S.FORM: ui, maljimalji sinsi.
oi, maljimalji sinsi.
anema su pinacunan a vuaq?
anema so pinaconan a voaq?
napacun aken ta liyav a 'atjuvi, izua uta liyav a 'aya'ayam.
napacon aken ta liyav a 'atjovi, izoa ota liyav a 'aya'ayam.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: kirimu, uri vaik anga men.
kirimo, ori vaik anga men.
S.TRANSL: Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: mayanan, maluljay aku kula.
mayanan, maloljay ako kola.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: ari seljangi a vaik a ljemanguy?
ari seljangi a vaik a ljemangoy?
nanguaq! ari!
nangoaq! ari!
tjuruvu a cawcau imaza a ljemanguljanguy.
tjorovo a cawcao imaza a ljemangoljangoy.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: vacalj a izua zaljum, tjemaza-i sakamaya a ljemanguy.
vacalj a izoa zaljom, tjemaza-i sakamaya a ljemangoy.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.

S.FORM: nakemuda sun a mangtjez?
nakemoda son a mangtjez?
nadjemavac aken.
nadjemavac aken.
anema su tinevavavan a zidusia?
anema so tinevavavan a zidosia?

S.FORM: natjevavaw aken ta basu.
natjevavaw aken ta baso.
anema su tjevavavan a sema kiukay?
anema so tjevavavan a sema kiokay?
S.TRANSL: What bus do you take to church?

S.FORM: pivavaven aken ta zidusia ni kama a sema zua.
pivavaven aken ta zidosia ni kama a sema zoa.
nukazumazuman kemuda timadju a sema gakku?
nokazomazoman kemoda timadjo a sema gakko?
S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?

S.FORM: tjevavav tua napatjatjeketjak a tjatjevavavan timadju a sema kakituluan.
tjevavav toa napatjatjeketjak a tjatjevavavan timadjo a sema kakitoloan.
S.TRANSL: He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: kemuda ti su vuvu nu vaik a kiveli ta ljaceng?
kemoda ti so vovo no vaik a kiveli ta ljaceng?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: ki'utubay timadju nu vaik a kiljaceng.
ki'otobay timadjo no vaik a kiljaceng.
S.TRANSL: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.

S.FORM: uri kemuda sun a vaik a sema Langi?
ori kemoda son a vaik a sema Langi?
S.TRANSL: How are you going to get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: uri tjevavav aken ta varukur a sema Langi.
ori tjevavav aken ta varokor a sema Langi.
S.TRANSL: I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

S.FORM: uri kemuda timadju a vaik a sema Langi?
ori kemoda timadjo a vaik a sema Langi?
S.TRANSL: How did he get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: tjevavav ta hikuki a sema Langi timadju.
tjevavav ta hikoki a sema Langi timadjo.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

S.FORM: anema a uri tjevavavan nimadju a sema Takau?
anema a ori tjevavavan nimadjo a sema Takao?
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

S.FORM: tjevavav ta tjaljasaljiukan a sema Takau timadju.
tjevavav ta tjaljasaljiokan a sema Takao timadjo.
S.TRANSL: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: natjevavav ta kisia a sema Taitu timadju?
natjevavav ta kisia a sema Taito timadjo?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: ui, natjevavav ta kisia a sema Taitu timadju.
oi, natjevavav ta kisia a sema Taito timadjo.
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: natjevavav ta kisia timadju a pasa Taitu?
natjevavav ta kisia timadjo a pasa Taito?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: ini, natjevavaw timadju tua hikuki a sema Taitu.
ini, natjevavaw timadjo toa hikoki a sema Taito.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: izua a ljaljevavavan ta basu i dudut ta icu imaza?
izoa a ljaljevavavan ta baso i dodot ta ico imaza?

S.FORM: izua, kisusu-u a sema 'ayav ki sun a pacun tua ljaljevavavan ta basu.
izoa, kisoso-o a sema 'ayav ki son a pacon toa ljaljevavavan ta baso.

Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: aicu a imaza inu a tjaljadudutan ta napatjatjaketjak a tjatjevavavan?
aico a imaza ino a tjaljadodotan ta napatjatjaketjak a tjatjevavavan?

Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: neka nuljaljevavavan imaza ta napatjatjaketjak a tjatjevavavan, amin a tjevavav ta zidusia.
neka noljaljevavavan imaza ta napatjatjaketjak a tjatjevavavan, amin a tjevavav ta zidosia.

There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: nu tjevavav ta basu a pasa gakku aki izua makudakuda a zikan?
no tjevavav ta baso a pasa gakko aki izoa makodakoda a zikan?
S.TRANSL: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: tapuluq katu lima a tukian ki djemaljun i gakku.
tapoloq kato lima a tokian ki djemaljon i gakko.
nu tjevavav tua tjaljasaljiukan a pasa Taiciu aki izua makudakuda a tukian ki djemaljun?
no tjevavav toa tjaljasaljiokan a pasa Taicio aki izoa makodakoda a tokian ki djemaljon?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?

S.FORM: izua ita tukian ki djemaljun i Taiciu.
izoa ita tokian ki djemaljon i Taicio.
S.TRANSL: 有一個小時的時間會到臺中。
I will be in Taichung for an hour.

S.FORM: nu ungting ta zidusia a sema Qulay aki cuay a zikang?
no ongting ta zidosia a sema Qolay aki coay a zikang?
S.TRANSL: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

S.FORM: tjara izua a ita a tukian.
tjara izoa a ita a tokian.
nu tjevavav sun a kemasi tua napatjatjatjatjak a tjatjevavavan a sema tjanuamen aki izua makudakuda a zikang?
no tjevavav son a kemasi toa napatjatjatjatjak a tjatjevavavan a sema tjanoamen aki izoa makodakoda a zikang?
S.TRANSL: 你搭捷運來我家要多久時間?
How long did it take you to come to my house by MRT?

S.FORM: drusa a puluq a tukian.
drosa a poloq a tokian.
macaqu sun a kitulai?
macaqo son a kitolai?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: ui, macaqu aken a kitulai.
oi, macaqo aken a kitolai.
izua a su qutubay?
izoa a so qotobay?
izua ku qutubay a ita.
izoa ko qotobay a ita.
izua a su qutubay?
izoa a so qotobay?
neka nu ku qutubay.
neka no ko qotobay.
makaya ken a kivadaq tjanusun?
makaya ken a kivadaq tjanoson?
makaya, selaing aken aravac.
makaya, selaing aken aravac.
makya ken a kivavadaq tjanusun?
makya ken a kivavadaq tjanoson?
inika makaya, kedri aku kingljan.
inika makaya, kedri ako kingljan.
S.TRANSL: Don’t, I don’t know much about it.

S.FORM: izua su zikang nu nakingcengelj? saljingan ken a sema zua a kivala tjanusun?
izoa so zikang no nakingcengelj? saljingan ken a sema zoa a kivala tjanoson?
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I’d like to visit you, is that okay?

S.FORM: ui, ku kaljava-u anga i tjumaq.
oi, ko kaljava-o anga i tjomaq.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: izua su zikang nutiyav? uri kivadaq aken tjanusun ta milimilingan nua paiwan zuku.
izoa so zikang notiyav? ori kivadaq aken tjanoson ta milimilingan noa paiwan zoko.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你關於排灣族的傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I’d like to ask you about the legendary story of the Paiwan people.

S.FORM: nutiav uri vaik aken a magadu, neka ken i tjumaq lja.
notiav ori vaik aken a magado, neka ken i tjomaq lja.
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I’m going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won’t be home.

S.FORM: naselangda ken tu kemeljang sun aravac tua pakata na sepaiwan a kakudanan, saljinga ken ta kivada tjanusun.
naselangda ken to kemeljang son aravac toa pakata na sepaiwan a kakodanan, saljinga ken ta kivada tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對排灣族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I heard that you know a lot about the traditional customs of the Paiwan people, so I would like to ask you something.

S.FORM: inika liyav aku kingljan, ljakua makaya ken a temevela tua ku kingljang.
inika liyav ako kingljan, ljakoa makaya ken a temevela toa ko kingljang.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don’t know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: makaya ken a pakavidiu? nu tjaivililj ki tjamadjulu anga sivecik.
makaya ken a pakavidio? no tjaivililj ki tjamadjolo anga sivecik.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: ui, inika makuda.
oi, inika makoda.
pidanga a su cavilj?
pidanga a so cavilj?
siva a pulu' saka alu anga a ku cavilj.
siva a polo' saka alo anga a ko cavilj.
maqacuvucuvung anan sun aravac.
maqacovocovong anan son aravac.
neka lja! vuluvulung anga ken.
neka lja! volovolong anga ken.
pai ku kivadaqai kemasinu sun?
pai ko kivadaqai kemasino son?
kemasi makazayazaya aken.
kemasi makazayazaya aken.
sepaiwan uta asu cekelj?
sepaiwan ota aso cekelj?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是排灣族人嗎?

S.FORM: ini, sepiyuma timadju.
ini, sepiyoma timadjo.
pida a su kinacaqu a kai?
pida a so kinacaqo a kai?
macaqu aken ta na seAmis a kata sepiyuma a kai.
macaqo aken ta na seAmis a kata sepiyoma a kai.
S.TRANSL: 我會說阿美語和卑南語。
I can speak Ami and Puyuma.

S.FORM: napasilevan aken aravac tua ku kinivadaqan tjanusun a vuaq, pai makaya qivu anan sun tua pakata palisi nua qemalju?
napasilevan aken aravac toa ko kinivadaqan tjanoson a voaq, pai makaya qivo anan son toa pakata palisi noa qemaljo?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It’s a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: ui, ka maqacuvucuvung anan aken ru sa gadu aken a qemaljup.
oi, ka maqacovocovong anan aken ro sa gado aken a qemaljop.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: maljimalji, tucu a vuaq pariya angata a su tinuluan.
maljimalji, toco a voaq pariya angata a so tinoloan.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: pariaria angata a ku qinaivuan. sinitaucikecikel nua tja sevalitan.
pariaria angata a ko qinaivoan. sinitaocikecikel noa tja sevalitan.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: tja patemazau a tja mare kivavadavadaq, maljimalji a su pinasemalavan.
tja patemazao a tja mare kivavadavadaq, maljimalji a so pinasemalavan.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That’s all for today’s interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: aku siaya, paresinglingliti anga uta.
ako siaya, paresinglingliti anga ota.
uri vaik anga ken, nakiljaljava ken nu tjaivalilj ki tjaliyav anga ku langdaing a milimilingan.
ori vaik anga ken, nakiljaljava ken no tjaivalilj ki tjaliyav anga ko langdaing a milimilingan.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I’m going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: ui, pai galjuanga.
oi, pai galjoanga.
nasuljivat sun, anema a uri su velin?
nasoljivat son, anema a ori so velin?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: uri veneli aken ta kupu.
ori veneli aken ta kopo.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: nasuljivat sun, anema a uri su velin?
nasoljivat son, anema a ori so velin?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what are you looking for?

S.FORM: uri veneli aken tu ita ta talupun.
ori veneli aken to ita ta talopon.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: uri veneli aken ta kupu, izua nu sipaveliveli?
ori veneli aken ta kopo, izoa no sipaveliveli?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?

S.FORM: izua, pida a su velin?
izoa, pida a so velin?
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: izua nu sipaveliveli a saviki?
izoa no sipaveliveli a saviki?
neka, inika men a paveliveli ta saviki.
neka, inika men a paveliveli ta saviki.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.

S.FORM: uri veneli aken ta paday.
ori veneli aken ta paday.
pida a su velin?
pida a so velin?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: keljan tu telu a tuvung.
keljan to telo a tovong.
uri veneli aken ta vurasi.
ori veneli aken ta vorasi.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: sinipaveli anga penuljat a vurasi.
sinipaveli anga penoljat a vorasi.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: uri veneli aken tu drusa ta djiuq.
ori veneli aken to drosa ta djioq.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: amin anga a ita i tjanuamen.
amin anga a ita i tjanoamen.
S.TRANSL: We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: sau velian aken ta qecilu.
sao velian aken ta qecilo.
uri nangking a su veliing?
ori nangking a so veliing?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: uri nangking a su veliing a qecilu?
ori nangking a so veliing a qecilo?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: uri veneli aken tu drusa a king.
ori veneli aken to drosa a king.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: uri veneli aken tu drusa a djaljeng a kucay.
ori veneli aken to drosa a djaljeng a kocay.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: izua tjelu a djaljengan a tjeza, nisun nay anga a penuljat.
izoa tjelo a djaljengan a tjeza, nison nay anga a penoljat.
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: pida a kakavilian ta icu i tuvung a paday?
pida a kakavilian ta ico i tovong a paday?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: nu ita i tuvung drusa iday.
no ita i tovong drosa iday.
drusa a pulu' katu ita a vatan a pipenuljayan, nu drusa a pulu' ki pariya.
drosa a polo' kato ita a vatan a pipenoljayan, no drosa a polo' ki pariya.
maljimalji.
maljimalji.
siva a pulu' katu lima vatan a imaza.
siva a polo' kato lima vatan a imaza.
pai kiveli anan aken tu kedri, padjaljuni tu taiday.
pai kiveli anan aken to kedri, padjaljoni to taiday.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: lima a iday saka puluq a vatan a pipenuljatan.
lima a iday saka poloq a vatan a pipenoljatan.
pai paka lima a idayu aken?
pai paka lima a idayo aken?
aicu pazangal aravac, makaya papemaduluin a pagalju?
aico pazangal aravac, makaya papemadoloin a pagaljo?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: inika makaya, aicu tjaljamaduluan anga aravac.
inika makaya, aico tjaljamadoloan anga aravac.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: uri veneli aken ta icu a kua.
ori veneli aken ta ico a koa.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: aicu a kua tjelu a puluq a vatan, izuanan a zuma uri su velin?
aico a koa tjelo a poloq a vatan, izoanan a zoma ori so velin?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: makaya ken a kisedjam ta su paisu?
makaya ken a kisedjam ta so paiso?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: makaya! uri pida a su kisedjamen?
makaya! ori pida a so kisedjamen?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: malim anga ken a kemacu ta ku paisu, makaya ken a kisedjam ta su paisu?
malim anga ken a kemaco ta ko paiso, makaya ken a kisedjam ta so paiso?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: inika ken a nakemacu ta paisu uta lja!
inika ken a nakemaco ta paiso ota lja!
S.TRANSL: I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: malim aken a kemacu ta ku paisu, makaya ken a kisedjam ta su paisu.
malim aken a kemaco ta ko paiso, makaya ken a kisedjam ta so paiso.
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: caqen, katjaisangas ka nakisedjam sun tjanuaken ta paisu inianan ka su pacikeli.
caqen, katjaisangas ka nakisedjam son tjanoaken ta paiso inianan ka so pacikeli.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: makaya ken a kisedjam ta su itung?
makaya ken a kisedjam ta so itong?
ui, alapu a kisumadju.
oi, alapo a kisomadjo.
makaya ken a kisedjam ta su sunat?
makaya ken a kisedjam ta so sonat?
ku sinipasedjam anga tjai selep.
ko sinipasedjam anga tjai selep.
pai pasedjami aken ta su tjukitjuku?
pai pasedjami aken ta so tjokitjoko?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: ui, ljakua pacikelu anga nutiav.
oi, ljakoa pacikelo anga notiav.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: 'emudja'udjalj anga, inika ken a nacemacu ta qausua, pai pasedjami aken ta su qausua?
'emodja'odjalj anga, inika ken a nacemaco ta qaosoa, pai pasedjami aken ta so qaosoa?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，請借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me one?

S.FORM: ita sakamaya a ku qausua, pai tja siqausuan a madrusa!
ita sakamaya a ko qaosoa, pai tja siqaosoan a madrosa!
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: aicu sunat mavan a su sinipasedjam tjanuaken ka katjaisangas, ku pacikelau tjanusun.
aico sonat mavan a so sinipasedjam tjanoaken ka katjaisangas, ko pacikelao tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: nu saljinga anan sun a pacun ta sunat makayanan sun a qivu tjanuaken.
no saljinga anan son a pacon ta sonat makayanan son a qivo tjanoaken.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: nungida nga ku pacikelen a su paisu?
nongida nga ko pacikelen a so paiso?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: inika makuda, 'adjavan anga nu izua nga su paisu qivu anga.
inika makoda, 'adjavan anga no izoa nga so paiso qivo anga.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It's okay, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: nungida nga su pacikelen a ku paisu?
nongida nga so pacikelen a ko paiso?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: ku pacikelau anga nutiav.
ko pacikelao anga notiav.
S.TRANSL: I'll return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: nungida nga su pacikelen a ku sunat?
nongida nga so pacikelen a ko sonat?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: aicu a inpic sinipasedjam ni kui tjanusun?
aico a inpic sinipasedjam ni koi tjanoson?
S.TRANSL: Did Kui lend you this pen?

S.FORM: ui, ku kinisedjam tjaimadju a vuaq.
oi, ko kinisedjam tjaimadjo a voaq.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: aicu a inpic su kinisedjam tjai kui?
aico a inpic so kinisedjam tjai koi?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Kui?

S.FORM: ini, ti kina a naveneli.
ini, ti kina a naveneli.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: nekanga nu 'atia, sau kisedjamu tjai pales tu kedri ta 'atia.
nekanga no 'atia, sao kisedjamo tjai pales to kedri ta 'atia.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Pales.

S.FORM: ui, vaik aken a kisedjam.
oi, vaik aken a kisedjam.
sau djaulju ti pales pacikelu aku paisu ayau.
sao djaoljo ti pales pacikelo ako paiso ayao.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Pales to give me back my money.

S.FORM: pida a kiam nimadju tjanusun?
pida a kiam nimadjo tjanoson?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: uri sema inu sun?
ori sema ino son?
vaik aken a sema puljacengan.
vaik aken a sema poljacengan.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: anema su kudakudain?
anema so kodakodain?
liyav a aravac a cemel, venasavasak aken, nusauni uri pazaljum aken.
liyav a aravac a cemel, venasavasak aken, nosaoni ori pazaljom aken.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There’s too much grass, I’m cutting it, I’ll have to water it later.

S.FORM: pai alapan aken ta kawkav kata tjatjukun?
pai alapan aken ta kawkav kata tjatjokon?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: su pininu?
so pinino?
i tjuljivar ta kakara.
i tjoljivar ta kakara.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: su kinavacukan anga?
so kinavacokan anga?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: ku kinavacukan anga, nusauni uri temugut.
ko kinavacokan anga, nosaoni ori temogot.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: a su sinitalem a ljaceng makayanga ta kiljasengen?
a so sinitalem a ljaceng makayanga ta kiljasengen?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: makaya nga kilkangrangen a imaza, azua ljaluin inianan ka makaya a kiljaluingen.
makaya nga kilkangrangen a imaza, azoa ljaloin inianan ka makaya a kiljaloingen.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: wa! manu liyav a su kinali a vurasi?
wa! mano liyav a so kinali a vorasi?
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: pai pusaladji aken a pasa ta kubav?
pai posaladji aken a pasa ta kobav?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: kemudakuda mun?
kemodakoda mon?
maray a men ta ciqaw.
maray a men ta ciqaw.
S.TRANSL: We are casting nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: liyav a ciqaw imaza.
liyav a ciqaw imaza.
liyav anga djiname' a ciqaw i tjaretjek.
liyav anga djiname' a ciqaw i tjaretjek.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: nu kaljakemudan a qadav kemuda sun a kiciqaw?
no kaljakemodan a qadav kemoda son a kiciqaw?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: mavan a raqas a ku sicekcek ta ciqaw.
mavan a raqas a ko sicekcek ta ciqaw.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: macaqu sun a cukau ta tiveljatan kata vakela a 'emaljup?
macaqo son a cokao ta tiveljatan kata vakela a 'emaljop?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: mavan a siringaringai a ku sikisacemel, izuanu malap aken tua ta kuang kata kemacu ta vatu.
mavan a siringaringai a ko sikisacemel, izoano malap aken toa ta koang kata kemaco ta vato.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: aicu djalan papakazuanan nua vavuy.
aico djalan papakazoanan noa vavoy.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: a ku sun a kemeljan?
a ko son a kemeljan?
aicu djekap na vavuy, manasika aicu mavan a papakazuanan a djalan nua vavuy.
aico djekap na vavoy, manasika aico mavan a papakazoanan a djalan noa vavoy.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: ari tja pacunay a tja ringay, namaya ta nadjemameq anga ta sacemel.
ari tja paconay a tja ringay, namaya ta nadjemameq anga ta sacemel.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: aku sun a kemljan?
ako son a kemljan?
namayata izua nga se'use'uin na vatu. ari kadjaljavi a semazua.
namayata izoa nga se'ose'oin na vato. ari kadjaljavi a semazoa.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let’s follow them.

S.FORM: anema su kasengsengsengsengen?
anema so kasengsengsengsengen?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: 'acev aicu, sidekedekep tua kulavav.
'acev aico, sidekedekep toa kolavav.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: azua su pinasazua anema zua?
azoa so pinasazoa anema zoa?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: azua tjukur, mavan a si'alju'aljup ta vanan.
azoa tjokor, mavan a si'aljo'aljop ta vanan.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: maljimalji a papumanguaqan nua tja sevalitan, liyav a tja qadav a vuaq.
maljimalji a papomangoaqan noa tja sevalitan, liyav a tja qadav a voaq.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: ui lja, tja siljevan a sema qinaljan!
oi lja, tja siljevan a sema qinaljan!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let’s take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: tucu a qadav tiaken a nu sirutemulu muri temulu aken tjanumun a masantalj tu kemuda qivu tua qemuzimuzip a penaiwanan.
toco a qadav tiaken a no sirotemolo mori temolo aken tjanomon a masantalj to kemoda qivo toa qemozimozip a penaiwanan.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教你們大家動物的排灣語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Paiwan language today.

S.FORM: tucu a qadav tiaken a nu sirutemulu muri temulu aken tjanumun a masantalj tu kemuda qivu tua cuvuq na kadjunangan a penaiwanan.
toco a qadav tiaken a no sirotemolo mori temolo aken tjanomon a masantalj to kemoda qivo toa covoq na kadjonangan a penaiwanan.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的排灣語怎麼說。

S.FORM: tucu a qadav tiaken a nu sirutemulu muri temulu aken tjanumun a masantalj tu kemuda qivu tua vangalj a penaiwanan.
toco a qadav tiaken a no sirotemolo mori temolo aken tjanomon a masantalj to kemoda qivo toa vangalj a penaiwanan.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的排灣語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in Paiwan language today.

S.FORM: nakuya taqed.
nakoya taqed.
nakuya ljemavaran.
nakoya ljemavaran.
nakuya keman tua nemanga.
nakoya keman toa nemanga.
patjevacaqu ta su kakituluan a sunatj.
patjevacaqo ta so kakitoloan a sonatj.
patjevacaqu ta su sivecivecik.
patjevacaqo ta so sivecivecik.
patjevacaqu ta su vaveciken.
patjevacaqo ta so vaveciken.
seqetju a kakituluan a sunatj.
seqetjo a kakitoloan a sonatj.
seqetju a sivecivecik.
seqetjo a sivecivecik.
seqetju a kakanen.
seqetjo a kakanen.
seqetju a kuku.
seqetjo a koko.
nima aicu a sivecivecik a qidung?
nima aico a sivecivecik a qidong?
niaken.
niaken.
nima aicu a kakituluan a sunatj?
nima aico a kakitoloan a sonatj?
ni Camak.
ni Camak.
nima aicu a siquliqulip.
nima aico a siqoliqolip.
ika aken a kemeljang.
ika aken a kemeljang.
ni Camak azua kava?
ni Camak azoa kava?
ini, ni Muni aicu a uba.
ini, ni Moni aico a oba.
ika aken a namasi kakituluan a sunatj.
ika aken a namasi kakitoloan a sonatj.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: kasadju a pacun kata su seljaseljang.
kasadjo a pacon kata so seljaseljang.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: maveceluq anga a ku sivecik a qidung.
maveceloq anga a ko sivecik a qidong.
ayawu tua incupi a vencik.
ayawo toa incopi a vencik.
maulav anga a ku siquliqulip.
maolav anga a ko siqoliqolip.
aza ku siquliqulip uza kisedjamu.
aza ko siqoliqolip oza kisedjamo.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: muri patjemaza anga tja kitulu, nu pasa umaq mun kipapaulingavu anga i djalan.
mori patjemaza anga tja kitolo, no pasa omaq mon kipapaolingavo anga i djalan.
S.TRANSL: 我們的課就上到這裡，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: ui. maljimalji sirutemulu.
oi. maljimalji sirotemolo.
ui. maljimalji sinsi.
oi. maljimalji sinsi.
muri patjemaza anga tja kitulu, ucevucevungi anga uta masantalj.
mori patjemaza anga tja kitolo, ocevocevongi anga ota masantalj.
S.TRANSL: 我們的課就上到這裡，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: ucevucevungi anga uta sirutemulu.
ocevocevongi anga ota sirotemolo.
ucevucevungi anga uta sinsi.
ocevocevongi anga ota sinsi.
mareka aiyanga masantalj, a ku ngadan ti Kuljelje.
mareka aiyanga masantalj, a ko ngadan ti Koljelje.
S.TRANSL: 各位大家好，我的名字是Kuljelje。
Hello everyone, my name is Kuljelje.

S.FORM: ui Kuljelje djavadjavay.
oi Koljelje djavadjavay.
mareka aiyanga masantalj ti Adriv a ku ngadan.
mareka aiyanga masantalj ti Adriv a ko ngadan.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Adriv.

S.FORM: ui Adriv djavadjavay.
oi Adriv djavadjavay.
ui, tjaqali ti Kuljelje aken.
oi, tjaqali ti Koljelje aken.
ui Kuljelje djavadjavay ti Veneng aken.
oi Koljelje djavadjavay ti Veneng aken.
ui djavadjavay ti Adriv aken.
oi djavadjavay ti Adriv aken.
ui Adriv djavadjavay ti Cangkim aken.
oi Adriv djavadjavay ti Cangkim aken.
au pay mana tima sun?
ao pay mana tima son?
ni Djanav aken a kina, ti Cangkim aken.
ni Djanav aken a kina, ti Cangkim aken.
au pay mana tima sun?
ao pay mana tima son?
vetjek aken ni Djanav a tjaljaljak a ku ngadan ti Veneng.
vetjek aken ni Djanav a tjaljaljak a ko ngadan ti Veneng.
S.TRANSL: 我是Djanav的妹妹，我的名字是Veneng。
I am Djanav’s sister. My name is Veneng.

S.FORM: au pay mana tima cu?
ao pay mana tima co?
timadju a ku sirutemulu, a ti Pacak.
timadjo a ko sirotemolo, a ti Pacak.
timadju a ku sinsi, a ti Pacak.
timadjo a ko sinsi, a ti Pacak.
azuwa mana tima?
azowa mana tima?
ti kaka azuwa, ti Pukirungan.
ti kaka azowa, ti Pokirongan.
ti Kuljelje aicu pay?
ti Koljelje aico pay?
ui, ti kuljelje aicu.
oi, ti koljelje aico.
ti Kuljelje sun pay?
ti Koljelje son pay?
ini, ti Kuy aken.
ini, ti Koy aken.
tima ti Kuy?
tima ti Koy?
ti Kuy mavana tiaken.
ti Koy mavana tiaken.
tima ti Kuljelje?
tima ti Koljelje?
tiaken a ti Kuljelje.
tiaken a ti Koljelje.
tima ti Kuy?
tima ti Koy?
ku qali ti Kuy.
ko qali ti Koy.
ti su kaka tima ngadan?
ti so kaka tima ngadan?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: ti Ravaci ti kaka.
ti Ravaci ti kaka.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Ravaci.

S.FORM: tima ngadan na su kaka?
tima ngadan na so kaka?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: ti Selep aza ku kaka.
ti Selep aza ko kaka.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Selep.

S.FORM: kemelang sun tua ngadan nimadju?

pidanga cavilj na so kaka ti Qozang?

S.FORM: lima anga a cavilj na ku kaka tucu.
lima anga a cavilj na ko kaka toco.

aza no qinaljan izoa kakitoloan?

aza no qinaljan izoa gakko?

izoa.

kitolotolo son itoa gakko i qinaljan?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: ui, nu kitulutulu amen i kakituluan matu tacemekeljan amen.
oi, no kitolotolo amen i kakitoloan mato tacemekeljan amen.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: ui, nu kitulutulu amen i gakku matu tacemekeljan amen.
oi, no kitolotolo amen i gakko mato tacemekeljan amen.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

anema sikasalialim na so kama?

sirotemolo ti kama.

ini, qali timadjo na ko kaka.

S.FORM: ti su kaka i Muni azuwa?

ini, ko kaka azowa.

mapida tiamadjo a tacekeljan?

manlima tiamadjo a tacekeljan.

masepatj a nia aljak.

neka no ko kaka oqaljay, izoa matjelo a vavayavayan.

neka no tjavolong a mareka ko kaka.

mapida a mareka so vetjek?

neka no mareka ko vetjek.

marekaka mon?

oi, ti kaka azowa.
kacalisian mun?
kacalisian mon?

oi, kacalisian amen.

sePaiwan ota timadjo?

namakuda a kinaqadaqadvan a vuaq?
namakoda a kinaqadaqadvan a voaq?
napevucelelj a kinaqadavan, suqacau anga a temkel tua maculjuculju a zaljum?
napevocelelj a kinaqadavan, soqacao anga a temkel toa macoljocoljo a zaljom?
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: namakuda a kinaqadaqadavan a vuaq?
namakoda a kinaqadaqadavan a voaq?
napezalangzang a kinaqadavan, suqacau anga a temkel tua maculjuculju a zaljum.
napezalangzang a kinaqadavan, soqacao anga a temkel toa macoljocoljo a zaljom.
S.TRANSL: It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: namakuda a kinaqadaqadavan nua i pasasav?
namakoda a kinaqadaqadavan noa i pasasav?
mapaselav a qadav, paqenutju anga tua kiljakev ta madrasi.
mapaselav a qadav, paqenotjo anga toa kiljakev ta madrasi.
S.TRANSL: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: namakuda a kinaqadaqadavan nua i pasasav?
namakoda a kinaqadaqadavan noa i pasasav?
mapaselav a qurepus, neka nu qadav.
mapaselav a qorepos, neka no qadav.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: namakuda a kinaqadaqadavan nutiav?
namakoda a kinaqadaqadavan notiav?
inika maqadav nutiav, qemurepus, saka venali a pautez.
inika maqadav notiav, qemorepos, saka venali a paotez.
S.TRANSL: 明天不會出太陽，雲多，且風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: namakuda a kinaqadaqadavan tazua qadav?
namakoda a kinaqadaqadavan tazoa qadav?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: tazua qadav napevucelelj, nu masasav tjaljananguaqan a mitung tua uba.
tazoa qadav napevocelelj, no masasav tjaljanangoaqan a mitong toa oba.
S.TRANSL: 這天有點冷，出門最好要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: namakuda a kinaqadaqadvan nu sipulavayan a qadav?
namakoda a kinaqadaqadvan no sipolavayan a qadav?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: nu sipulavayan a qadav na saljiang a kinaqadavan.
no sipolavayan a qadav na saljiang a kinaqadavan.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: qemudjalj tazua qadav?
qemodjalj tazoa qadav?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: saljiang a kinaqadavan tazua, inika qemudjalj.
saljiang a kinaqadavan tazoa, inika qemodjalj.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: qemudjalj tazua qadav?
qemodjalj tazoa qadav?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: ui, qemudjalj tazua qadav.
oi, qemodjalj tazoa qadav.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: qemudjaqudjalj tucu pay?
qemodjaqodjalj toco pay?
meljay anga, maqdav anga.
meljay anga, maqdav anga.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: qemudjaqudjalj tucu?
qemodjaqodjalj toco?
qemudjaqudjalj anga, ika aken a namasi kacalaq.
qemodjaqodjalj anga, ika aken a namasi kacalaq.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: qemudjaqudjalj a i pasasav?
qemodjaqodjalj a i pasasav?
inika qemudjaqudjalj tucu, nu masukincengelj ki qemudjalj, nu masasav tjaljananguaqan a masi kacalaq.
inika qemodjaqodjalj toco, no masokincengelj ki qemodjalj, no masasav tjaljanangoaqan a masi kacalaq.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門最好要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: muri vucelelj aravac nuicavilj pay?
mori vocelelj aravac noicavilj pay?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: ui, muri vucelelj aravac nuicavilj, pakaliavu anga mitung.
oi, mori vocelelj aravac noicavilj, pakaliavo anga mitong.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: tucuacavilj nu kaljazalangzangan muri zalangzang aravac pay?
tocoacavilj no kaljazalangzangan mori zalangzang aravac pay?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: ui, nu kaljazalangzangan muri zalangzang aravac, gedegedu anga temkel tua zaljum.
oi, no kaljazalangzangan mori zalangzang aravac, gedegedo anga temkel toa zaljom.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: tjengelay sun tua kaljavevean?
tjengelay son toa kaljavevean?
tjengelay aken tua kaljavevean, saljavljavljav a kinaqdavan.
tjengelay aken toa kaljavevean, saljavljavljav a kinaqdavan.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: tjengelay sun tua kaljauragan?
tjengelay son toa kaljaoragan?
ika aken a tjengelay tua kaljauragan, liav aravac a raljiz nu kaljauragan.
ika aken a tjengelay toa kaljaoragan, liav aravac a raljiz no kaljaoragan.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: malim anga aken a masi kakituan a sunatj.
malim anga aken a masi kakitoan a sonatj.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: kisadj aken tjanusun a pacun.
kisadj aken tjanoson a pacon.

malim anga aken a masi siqoliqolip.

S.FORM: ku pasedjamay sun.
ko pasedjamay son.
malim anga sun a masi sivecik?
malim anga son a masi sivecik?

S.FORM: ui, pasedjami aken tua su sivecik dri?
oi, pasedjami aken toa so sivecik dri?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: anema muri su cengelj?
anema mori so cengelj?

S.FORM: muri kincengelj aken tua pang.
mori kincengelj aken toa pang.
anema muri su kaiven?

S.FORM: muri kaiv aken tua vaqu.
mori kaiv aken toa vaqo.

S.FORM: na kenama aken tua qecilu.
na kenama aken toa qecilo.
anema su kinincengelj.
anema so kinincengelj.
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: na kincengelj aken tua kuka.
na kincengelj aken toa koka.
vaiki a tjemakidr tua budru.
vaiki a tjemakidr toa bodro.
sau vaivaiku, nusauni ku kimav anga sun.
sao vaivaiko, nosaoni ko kimav anga son.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: vaiki a ljemanguy.
vaiki a ljemangoy.
padria! ari kaciuciuri.
padria! ari kaciociori.
nanguaq! ari kaciuciuri.
nangoaq! ari kaciociori.
vaiki a kivangavang ta budru.
vaiki a kivangavang ta bodro.
ini,vaiki anan a semakuc tua sunatj.
ini,vaiki anan a semakoc toa sonatj.

S.FORM: na menurumur anga sun?
na menoromor anga son?
ini anan, semenasenav anan aken tua capar.
ini anan, semenasenav anan aken toa capar.

S.FORM: ini anan, semenasenav anan aken tua kisi.
ini anan, semenasenav anan aken toa kisi.

S.FORM: su siniqumu anga sa su beresan?
so siniqomo anga sa so beresan?

S.FORM: na qemumu anga aken sa ku beresan.
na qemomo anga aken sa ko beresan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: na semenav anga sun ta capar?
na semenav anga son ta capar?
na semenav anga sun ta kisi?
na semenav anga son ta kisi?
ku sinnavan anga capar.
ko sinnavan anga capar.
ku sinnavan anga kisi.
ko sinnavan anga kisi.
aku ika sun a na pilima?
ako ika son a na pilima?
S.TRANSL: Why didn’t you wash your hands?

S.FORM: pilima anga aken nusauni.
pilima anga aken nosaoni.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: kemudakuda sun tasauni?
kemodakoda son tasaoni?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: na vaik aken a kipakim tjay sirutemulu.
na vaik aken a kipakim tjay sirotemolo.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: na vaik aken a kipakim tjay sinsi.
na vaik aken a kipakim tjay sinsi.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: nu qemacuvung anga sun tua kitulu anema su kudain?
no qemacovong anga son toa kitolo anema so kodain?

S.FORM: muri puntalj aken a pasa umaq.
mori pontalj aken a pasa omaq.
nu qemacuvung ta kitulu ti sautji anema muri kudain?
no qemacovong ta kitolo ti saotji anema mori kodain?

S.FORM: muri vaik ti sautji a temaligitigan.
mori vaik ti saotji a temaligitigan.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: muri vaik ti sautji a iugi.
mori vaik ti saotji a iogi.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Tjeljev, i tjumaq sun?
Tjeljev, i tjomaq son?
ui izua, kirimu tjumaqu.
oi izoa, kirimo tjomaqo.
ui izua, kirimu tedepu.
oi izoa, kirimo tedepo.
Tjeljev, i tjumaq sun?
Tjeljev, i tjomaq son?
neka i tjumaq ti Tjeljev! ti Sangkilj aken, anema su sikikim? ku sipatukuljan anga nu mantjez ti Tjeljev.
neka i tjomaq ti Tjeljev! ti Sangkilj aken, anema so sikikim? ko sipatokoljan anga no mantjez ti Tjeljev.
S.TRANSL: Tjeljev不在家耶！我是Sangkilj，有什麼事找嗎？回來我會轉告Tjeljev。
Tjeljev is not at home. I am Sangkilj. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: timaima mun?
timaima mon?
vuvu, ti Sankilj aken kati Tjeljev, pay suqeljevi amen.
vovo, ti Sankilj aken kati Tjeljev, pay soqeljevi amen.
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我是Sangkilj和Tjeljev，請給我們開門！
Grandma, we are Sankilj and Tjeljev, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: kacumusu, ti Sankilj aken kati Tjeljev, pay suqeljevi amen.
kacomoso, ti Sankilj aken kati Tjeljev, pay soqeljevi amen.
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我是Sangkilj和Tjeljev，請給我們開門！
Grandma, we are Sankilj and Tjeljev, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: tima?
tima?
ti Ripun aken, kemikim aken a semamaza tjay Giana.
ti Ripon aken, kemikim aken a semamaza tjay Giana.
S.TRANSL: I am Ripun, I am here for Giana.

S.FORM: kacumusu, mangtjengtjez aken lja ljemilji tjanusun.
kacomoso, mangtjengtjez aken lja ljemilji tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: vuvu, mangtjengtjez aken lja ljemilji tjanusun.
vovo, mangtjengtjez aken lja ljemilji tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: cuacuay anga sun lja ika mangtjengtjez, pay singelit anga aken aravac tjanusun.
coacoay anga son lja ika mangtjengtjez, pay singelit anga aken aravac tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Tjeljev, mangtjengtjez aken lja kipakim tjanusun tua kivangavang.
Tjeljev, mangtjengtjez aken lja kipakim tjanoson toa kivangavang.
S.TRANSL: Tjeljev, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: kirimu tedepu, cuay anga aken a tjakaljavaljava tjnusun.
kirimo tedepo, coay anga aken a tjakaljavaljava tjnoson.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: kirimu tjumaqu, cuay anga aken a tjakaljavaljava tjnusun.
kirimo tjomaqo, coay anga aken a tjakaljavaljava tjnoson.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: tiaken a natemalem taicu a vurasi, pay kanu a pavavala.
tiaken a natemalem taico a vorasi, pay kano a pavavala.
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看！
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: aicu a vurasi qaljemeqem aravac.
aico a vorasi qaljemeqem aravac.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: kelju! aicu a vangalj tiaken a natemalem, pay kanu a pavavala.
keljo! aico a vangalj tiaken a natemalem, pay kano a pavavala.
S.TRANSL: 來!這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: aicu a vangalj qaljemeqem aravac.
aico a vangalj qaljemeqem aravac.
pay qiladju! aicu a ljapanay a sinikilaing tua qinatian tiaken a natemalem pay kanu a pavavala.
pay qiladjo! aico a ljapanay a sinikilaing toa qinatian tiaken a natemalem pay kano a pavavala.
S.TRANSL: 請坐！這是我種的有機玉米吃看看！
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: wu! aicu a ljapanay qaljemeqem aravac.
wo! aico a ljapanay qaljemeqem aravac.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: keman sun tua tjianes?
keman son toa tjianes?
ika aken a makaya keman tua tjianes, nu keman aken tua cadaq padria.
ika aken a makaya keman toa tjianes, no keman aken toa cadaq padria.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: keman sun tua tinapi?
keman son toa tinapi?
keman sun tua bisukitu?
keman son toa bisokito?
ui, tjenglay aken aravac.
oi, tjenglay aken aravac.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: pay ku sisungicuan tua vangalj ta su kanen.
pay ko sisongicoan toa vangalj ta so kanen.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: maljimalji, aicu a vangalj puqetim aravac.
maljimalji, aico a vangalj poqetim aravac.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: pay ku sialapan sun tua zaljum ta su tekelen.
pay ko sialapan son toa zaljom ta so tekelen.
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.

S.FORM: maljimalji
maljimalji
suliavu a keman, liav aravac a ku kinsa djamay.
soliavo a keman, liav aravac a ko kinsa djamay.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: wu! aicu salum saka sanguaq angata.
wo! aico salom saka sangoaq angata.
S.TRANSL: 嗚! 真的很香也好吃。
Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: suliavu a keman, uza liav anan a imaza.
soliavo a keman, oza liav anan a imaza.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: numatazua ika anga aken lja masiaq!
nomatazoa ika anga aken lja masiaq!
S.TRANSL: I’ll make myself at home then.

S.FORM: suliavu a keman, uza liav anan a imaza.
soliavo a keman, oza liav anan a imaza.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: liav anga aravac a ku kinan, nekanga nu ku sivalan a keman.
liav anga aravac a ko kinan, nekanga no ko sivalan a keman.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，不能再吃了。

toco a qadav mori vaik itjen a benoljebolj.

izoa izowa a miperepereper a pasasivalj a qoljicacenglav.

tjao pacon aken a voaq toa kaqolidan a valjoaljot a qoljicacenglav.

S.FORM: izua izuwa a miperepereper a pasasivalj a kalabiabi.
izoa izowa a miperepereper a pasasivalj a kalabiabi.
ya! wa! tjengelay aken tua kalabiabi, nguanguaq aravac.

S.FORM: izua izuwa a miperepereper a pasasivalj a kalabiabi.
izoa izowa a miperepereper a pasasivalj a kalabiabi.

inika kalabiabi azowa, pangac azowa.

S.FORM: ui, inika amen a ljiacadja a matjuzuma.
oi, inika amen a ljiacadja a matjozoma.

Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: nakuya mekelj lja, galju a djemavac manu matjani mun.
nakoya mekelj lja, galjo a djemavac mano matjani mon.

S.FORM: muri kirimu a pacun a ku varung.
mori kirimo a pacon a ko varong.

mori makanema timadjo no sema bioing?

anema so pakavavavan no sema omaq son?

na makavavav toa ljiok ti Moni a sema kakitoloan.

S.FORM: na makavavav tua ljiuk ti Muni a sema gakku.
na makavavav toa ljiok ti Moni a sema gakko.

anema pakavavavan ni Camak no sema lizok?

na makatolay ti Camak no sema lizok.

makavavav son toa sipatjatjeketjek a ljiok a sema kakitoloan?

ini, makavavav aken toa baso no sema gakko.

ini, makavavav aken toa baso no sema kakitoloan.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: makatulay sun nu sema kakituluan?
makatolay son no sema kakitoloan?

S.FORM: makatulay sun nu sema gakku?
makatolay son no sema gakko?

oi, makatolay aken no sema kakitoloan.

S.FORM: ui, makatulay aken nu sema gakku.
oi, makatolay aken no sema gakko.

tjevavav son toa tjasaljiok no sema Takao?

oi, makavavav aken toa tjasaljiok no sema Tjoaqao aken.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

oi, makavavav aken toa tjasaljiok no sema Takao aken.

no sema Valangao son ljiok a so pakavavavan mano sikoki?

S.FORM: makavavav aken ta sikuki, tjadjaljav a sikuki tua ljiuk.
makavavav aken ta sikoki, tjadjaljav a sikoki toa ljiok.

S.FORM: nu sema lizuk sun makavavav sun tua basu manu maka palidring sun?
no sema lizok son makavavav son toa baso mano maka palidring son?

S.FORM: makapalidring aken a sema lizuk, tjamadjulu a makapalidring tua makabasu.
makapalidring aken a sema lizok, tjamadjolo a makapalidring toa makabaso.
