S.FORM: aza sinantjaljacadjuran a siubay na sedut tua nu umaq?
aza sinantjaljacadjoran a siobay na sedot toa no omaq?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: inika dut, semavid aken a maka utubay nu sema ta sinantjaljacadjuran a siubay aken.
inika dot, semavid aken a maka otobay no sema ta sinantjaljacadjoran a siobay aken.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: aza pusasusuqanan na sedut tua kakituluan?
aza posasosoqanan na sedot toa kakitoloan?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: aza pusasusuqanan na sedut tua gakku?
aza posasosoqanan na sedot toa gakko?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: dut aravac, nu djemavac tja djaljunen.
dot aravac, no djemavac tja djaljonen.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: aza kakanan na sedut tua ljaljevavavan tua palidring?
aza kakanan na sedot toa ljaljevavavan toa palidring?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: nu sasav ta ljaljevavavan ta palidring sa djavac nu lima a qutjequtjan tja djaljunen.
no sasav ta ljaljevavavan ta palidring sa djavac no lima a qotjeqotjan tja djaljonen.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: izua su cug a vuaq?
izoa so cog a voaq?
takemuda?
takemoda?
na venarung aken tu vaik a kivala tjanusun.
na venarong aken to vaik a kivala tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: izua ku sikasalialim a vuaq ika aken a i tjumaq, ki pinungiday anga kaumaya.
izoa ko sikasalialim a voaq ika aken a i tjomaq, ki pinongiday anga kaomaya.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家，改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: au nutiav izua su cug? ku kimav anga sun nu masukincengelj.
ao notiav izoa so cog? ko kimav anga son no masokincengelj.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: makaya, ku kaljavav anga sun i tjumaq.
makaya, ko kaljavav anga son i tjomaq.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: kivadaqay pay makaya aken a penaseqilja kiljingav? na venarung aken tua penuadjuqan.
kivadaqay pay makaya aken a penaseqilja kiljingav? na venarong aken toa penoadjoqan.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: nanguaq dri! ikamakuda.
nangoaq dri! ikamakoda.
makaya penaseqilja paqailjungan?
makaya penaseqilja paqailjongan?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: kuyakuya aken, ika namaparimasudj uta salang, palaingi.
koyakoya aken, ika namaparimasodj ota salang, palaingi.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: au numatazua ki aken a paqayljungan sakamaya.
ao nomatazoa ki aken a paqayljongan sakamaya.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: au numatazua ki aken a pasasing sakamaya.
ao nomatazoa ki aken a pasasing sakamaya.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: palaingi uta paqailjungan.
palaingi ota paqailjongan.
palaingi uta pasasing.
palaingi ota pasasing.
maljimalji tua pukauyi sun a ku kivavadaqan.
maljimalji toa pokaoyi son a ko kivavadaqan.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: ikamakuda, anema su vinarung tu kivadaq?
ikamakoda, anema so vinarong to kivadaq?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: kivadaqay sun pay ka maqacuvucuvung sun anema su kudakudain.
kivadaqay son pay ka maqacovocovong son anema so kodakodain.
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: kisacu aken ka sicuayan, ljakua tucu na kitjaula anga aken.
kisaco aken ka sicoayan, ljakoa toco na kitjaola anga aken.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: au tucu izua su sengsengan?
ao toco izoa so sengsengan?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: i gakku aken a kipusalialim.
i gakko aken a kiposalialim.
pay kivadaqay sun aza su aljak imazamaza i qinaljan?
pay kivadaqay son aza so aljak imazamaza i qinaljan?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: ini, aza ku aljak imazamaza i lizuk.
ini, aza ko aljak imazamaza i lizok.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: au menacidicidiljan sun?
ao menacidicidiljan son?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: paquziquzip aken uta tu ita ta vatu kata ita qayaqayam, ku cemkemkelj uta tiamadju.
paqoziqozip aken ota to ita ta vato kata ita qayaqayam, ko cemkemkelj ota tiamadjo.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: paquziquzip aken uta tu ita tua ngiav, nu izua qemuzimuzip a tja saladj ika itjen a kipusepeljan.
paqoziqozip aken ota to ita toa ngiav, no izoa qemozimozip a tja saladj ika itjen a kiposepeljan.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: kinemnem aken tua kivadaq tjanusun tua pakata palisian na siqaljupan.
kinemnem aken toa kivadaq tjanoson toa pakata palisian na siqaljopan.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: inika liav amaya ku kineljang, ljakua aza ku keljangen ki ku su tevelay sakamaya.
inika liav amaya ko kineljang, ljakoa aza ko keljangen ki ko so tevelay sakamaya.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我知道的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: aza nu siqaljuqaljup a turivecan izua nema a palisian.
aza no siqaljoqaljop a torivecan izoa nema a palisian.
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的獵具有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: aza nia siqaljuqaljup a turivecan inika makaya sipacelecel tua vavayan.
aza nia siqaljoqaljop a torivecan inika makaya sipacelecel toa vavayan.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的獵具不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: au aicu a vavayavayan makaya kiciur a qemaljup?
ao aico a vavayavayan makaya kicior a qemaljop?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: inika makaya, inika makaya uta qemaljup a vavayavayan.
inika makaya, inika makaya ota qemaljop a vavayavayan.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Camak, neka anga nu tja paday a vinava, sau vaiku a veneli.
Camak, neka anga no tja paday a vinava, sao vaiko a veneli.
S.TRANSL: Camak，我們家裡沒有米酒了，你去買吧。
Camak, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: izua anan a tanuita i kindraljum i kakesan, palaingi tua veneli.
izoa anan a tanoita i kindraljom i kakesan, palaingi toa veneli.
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: inika cengceng a tanuita i kindraljum, sau veliu anan tu tjanudrusa anga i kindraljum.
inika cengceng a tanoita i kindraljom, sao velio anan to tjanodrosa anga i kindraljom.
S.TRANSL: One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: muri veneli aken tua paday a vinava, izua nu sipaveliveli?
mori veneli aken toa paday a vinava, izoa no sipaveliveli?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: izua! pida su velin?
izoa! pida so velin?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: veneli aken tu tjanudrusa i kindraljum, sake veli uta tu tanuita i tuvung tua paday.
veneli aken to tjanodrosa i kindraljom, sake veli ota to tanoita i tovong toa paday.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一袋米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: uza imaza sa paday, anemaneman a su kinakelekel?
oza imaza sa paday, anemaneman a so kinakelekel?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: veneli anan aken tua qecilu, izua nu sipaveliveli?
veneli anan aken toa qecilo, izoa no sipaveliveli?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: nasepaveli anga nia qecilu a qemdjeljem.
nasepaveli anga nia qecilo a qemdjeljem.
muri veneli aken tua kava.
mori veneli aken toa kava.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: namakuda a kinakemudan na su varung?
namakoda a kinakemodan na so varong?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: muri veneli aken tua drikidrikitj a lima nu kavan.
mori veneli aken toa drikidrikitj a lima no kavan.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: namakuda cu a qudjidjilj?
namakoda co a qodjidjilj?
izua zuma quljav?
izoa zoma qoljav?
izuanan a nia vucelacelay kata samljam.
izoanan a nia vocelacelay kata samljam.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: pay pavay aken tu tacaucauan tua samljam a kava.
pay pavay aken to tacaocaoan toa samljam a kava.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Camak kasinu sun tasauni? na kipalalaciq sun?
Camak kasino son tasaoni? na kipalalaciq son?
S.TRANSL: Camak你剛剛去哪裡?你去運動嗎?
Camak, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: Camak kasinu sun tasauni? na undu sun?
Camak kasino son tasaoni? na ondo son?
S.TRANSL: Camak你剛剛去哪裡?你去運動嗎?
Camak, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: ini, na vaik aken a pusaladj tjay vuvu a paveli tua ljaceng.
ini, na vaik aken a posaladj tjay vovo a paveli toa ljaceng.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: ini, na vaik aken a pusaladj tjay kacumusu a paveli tua ljaceng.
ini, na vaik aken a posaladj tjay kacomoso a paveli toa ljaceng.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: manu kemuda, izua su cug nu qezemetj? makaya itjen a malingulj a keman?
mano kemoda, izoa so cog no qezemetj? makaya itjen a malingolj a keman?
S.TRANSL: 原來這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空?可不可以和我一起吃飯?
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: ikamakaya, muri vaik aken a veneli tua kava.
ikamakaya, mori vaik aken a veneli toa kava.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: numatazua ari kiciur aken tjanusun.
nomatazoa ari kicior aken tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: 這樣的話，走我跟你一起去。
Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: pay pida kakavelian naicu a djinaljeng a ljaceng.
pay pida kakavelian naico a djinaljeng a ljaceng.
S.TRANSL: Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: nu tadjaljengan a ljaceng drusa puluq a vatan.
no tadjaljengan a ljaceng drosa poloq a vatan.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: aicu a vurasi pida a kakavelian.
aico a vorasi pida a kakavelian.
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: nu tatjingtjingan a vurasi tjelu a puluq a vatan.
no tatjingtjingan a vorasi tjelo a poloq a vatan.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: pay pavay aken tu drusa djaljeng ta ljaceng kata tatjingtjingan a vurasi.
pay pavay aken to drosa djaljeng ta ljaceng kata tatjingtjingan a vorasi.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Camak, malim anga aken a masi siquliqulip makaya aken a su pasedjaman?
Camak, malim anga aken a masi siqoliqolip makaya aken a so pasedjaman?
S.TRANSL: Camak，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Camak, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: neka uta nu niaken, ni Muni aicu.
neka ota no niaken, ni Moni aico.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Muni’s.

S.FORM: saka makaya ku kisedjamen a palamu? palamu sa ku pacikeli tjanusun.
saka makaya ko kisedjamen a palamo? palamo sa ko pacikeli tjanoson.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: ui, pay lapu.
oi, pay lapo.
maljimalji, pumaljimaljian anga aken uta tjay Muni.
maljimalji, pomaljimaljian anga aken ota tjay Moni.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Muni for me.

S.FORM: anema su kinakelekel?
anema so kinakelekel?
muri pacikel aken taicu a drusa sunatj.
mori pacikel aken taico a drosa sonatj.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: manukemuda, izuanan a su kinakelekel?
manokemoda, izoanan a so kinakelekel?
S.TRANSL: 原來如此，還需要什麼嗎?
No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: muri kisedjam anan aken taicu a tjelu a sunatj.
mori kisedjam anan aken taico a tjelo a sonatj.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: padria. paqenetju nu sipakatjelulj a qadav keljan anga penacikel.
padria. paqenetjo no sipakatjelolj a qadav keljan anga penacikel.
S.TRANSL: 好的。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: inia su pacikeli a ku siquliqulip lja.
inia so pacikeli a ko siqoliqolip lja.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: ku pinacikel anga tatiav.
ko pinacikel anga tatiav.
saka aku ika anga mapacucun a ku siquliqulip.
saka ako ika anga mapacocon a ko siqoliqolip.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: inika su sinipasedjam anga tjay Camak.
inika so sinipasedjam anga tjay Camak.
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Camak?

S.FORM: qadjav. pay ku kivavadaqay anga timadju.
qadjav. pay ko kivavadaqay anga timadjo.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: aza ku siquliqulip sau kisedjamu anan.
aza ko siqoliqolip sao kisedjamo anan.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Muni, aicu a uba sini pasedjam pay ni Camak tjanusun?
Moni, aico a oba sini pasedjam pay ni Camak tjanoson?
S.TRANSL: Muni, did Camak lend you this coat?

S.FORM: ini, aicu vinli ni kina tjanuaken.
ini, aico vinli ni kina tjanoaken.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: aza uba ni Camak mamav kata nisun.
aza oba ni Camak mamav kata nison.
S.TRANSL: Camak’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: aza nimadju a uba qucengecengel, maretimalj a nia quljav.
aza nimadjo a oba qocengecengel, maretimalj a nia qoljav.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Muni, nakisedjam sun tjay Camak tua valjitjuq?
Moni, nakisedjam son tjay Camak toa valjitjoq?
S.TRANSL: Muni, did you borrow money from Camak?

S.FORM: Muni, nakisedjam sun tjay Camak tua paisu?
Moni, nakisedjam son tjay Camak toa paiso?
S.TRANSL: Muni, did you borrow money from Camak?

S.FORM: ui, muri ku pacikelen a vuaq a ku varung, ljakua malim aken a masi valjitjuq.
oi, mori ko pacikelen a voaq a ko varong, ljakoa malim aken a masi valjitjoq.
S.TRANSL: 是，我本來今天要還他，但是我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: ui, muri ku pacikelen a vuaq a ku varung, ljakua malim aken a masi paisu.
oi, mori ko pacikelen a voaq a ko varong, ljakoa malim aken a masi paiso.
S.TRANSL: 是，我本來今天要還他，但是我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: au saka nungida anga su pacikelen?
ao saka nongida anga so pacikelen?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: ku pacikelav anga nutiav tjaimadju.
ko pacikelav anga notiav tjaimadjo.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: ui, ku pusaladjay anga sun a pasasinukukuz tjai Camak.
oi, ko posaladjay anga son a pasasinokokoz tjai Camak.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Camak for you.

S.FORM: aicu a kikulavav tjara sipuqacev nu puparaung, aicu a kitjikuray tjara sipuseluc nu puparaung, manazua padriadria.
aico a kikolavav tjara sipoqacev no poparaong, aico a kitjikoray tjara siposeloc no poparaong, manazoa padriadria.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: manukemuda, pasalisaliv aken! djaljepan a ika aken a makadjameq.
manokemoda, pasalisaliv aken! djaljepan a ika aken a makadjameq.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: pay ku tuluay anan sun a mumalj tu aicu a masan musalj a sisan puraungan.
pay ko toloay anan son a momalj to aico a masan mosalj a sisan poraongan.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: nanguaq! padria angata! pay nu matazua nu tjaivililj ki aken a makadjameq anga tua qaljuqaljupen.
nangoaq! padria angata! pay no matazoa no tjaivililj ki aken a makadjameq anga toa qaljoqaljopen.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: qaqacan anga cemel i vavua, sau vaiku a sema salang a malap tua kaukav, vaiki a sema vavua.
qaqacan anga cemel i vavoa, sao vaiko a sema salang a malap toa kaokav, vaiki a sema vavoa.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: pininu aza kaukav?
pinino aza kaokav?
aza izua itua tjakaz i tjuljivar, nu temdep sun i salang ki su pacuni.
aza izoa itoa tjakaz i tjoljivar, no temdep son i salang ki so paconi.
S.TRANSL: 在簍子的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: kipapaulingavu nu malap, nakuya mapasaqetju radjay aravac a kaukav.
kipapaolingavo no malap, nakoya mapasaqetjo radjay aravac a kaokav.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷。鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: nakuya demulat tua ku sinipuraung.
nakoya demolat toa ko siniporaong.
iyainuan aza su sinipuraung?
iyainoan aza so siniporaong?
izainuan aza su sinipuraung?
izainoan aza so siniporaong?
i patekuteku ta zua kasiv aza ku sinipuraung.
i patekoteko ta zoa kasiv aza ko siniporaong.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: aku tu maka paqenetj sun?
ako to maka paqenetj son?
aku zua maka paqenetj sun?
ako zoa maka paqenetj son?
ku pinukakeljanga a pimaza, kemeljang aken tu inu a ku sinipuraung.
ko pinokakeljanga a pimaza, kemeljang aken to ino a ko siniporaong.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: ku pinukakeljanga a pimaza, kemeljang aken tu izainu a ku sinipuraung.
ko pinokakeljanga a pimaza, kemeljang aken to izaino a ko siniporaong.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: varas aicu, nia piniljaving tua pana a venaras tua ciqav.
varas aico, nia piniljaving toa pana a venaras toa ciqav.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: tiamen i pasa zuwa neka nu nia varas, savid tu penanadip amen nu kiciqav.
tiamen i pasa zowa neka no nia varas, savid to penanadip amen no kiciqav.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: inia ku seljudj a penanadip, tuluy anga aken nu tjaivililj dri?
inia ko seljodj a penanadip, toloy anga aken no tjaivililj dri?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: padria! kaciuri anga nu tjaivililj a penanadip.
padria! kaciori anga no tjaivililj a penanadip.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: nanguaq! kaciuri anga nu tjaivililj a penanadip.
nangoaq! kaciori anga no tjaivililj a penanadip.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: au nu tjaivililj ku tuluay anga sun tua seman varas.
ao no tjaivililj ko toloay anga son toa seman varas.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: aza su panadip matidrtidrtidr anga, palemek tu izua anga natjekalavis a ciqav! kirirnu viljevilju.
aza so panadip matidrtidrtidr anga, palemek to izoa anga natjekalavis a ciqav! kirirno viljeviljo.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿晃動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: mayanan, mizazingay aravac a varukur. tjaljumaza aken a veniljevilj tua kalavis, sau pusaladji aken a mazuwa malap ta aray.
mayanan, mizazingay aravac a varokor. tjaljomaza aken a veniljevilj toa kalavis, sao posaladji aken a mazowa malap ta aray.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: pay viljevilju a pasa maza i tjanuaken aza ciqav. ku pusaladjay sun a veniljevilj.
pay viljeviljo a pasa maza i tjanoaken aza ciqav. ko posaladjay son a veniljevilj.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: padria angata! na puqadav a vuaq, namapeljuq anga mareka kuni.
padria angata! na poqadav a voaq, namapeljoq anga mareka koni.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: ari vaiki tja pakalevay a masantalj.
ari vaiki tja pakalevay a masantalj.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家報喜訊。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: vaca' angang tji sinsi.
vaca' angang tji sinsi.
mayanga kivangevang, iladji.
mayanga kivangevang, iladji.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: djavadjavai a mapuljat, sekavelilj angaken!
djavadjavai a mapoljat, sekavelilj angaken!
tjma u' kerimu.
tjma o' kerimo.
sicigianga tucu a adau?
sicigianga toco a adao?
sinciuanga tucu a adau, yasumi nu tjuau, vaiki a kinangevang!
sincioanga toco a adao, yasomi no tjoao, vaiki a kinangevang!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: naguae'! vaki a ma pana.
nagoae'! vaki a ma pana.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: sincigi nu tjiyau?
sincigi no tjiyao?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: sicisan nu tjiyau, vakiya mennali!
sicisan no tjiyao, vakiya mennali!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: anema rusu kudain nu tjyau a kadjamadjaman?
anema roso kodain no tjyao a kadjamadjaman?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: nutjyau ripaitjin, aru sema tjukai amen ka tji kina.
notjyao ripaitjin, aro sema tjokai amen ka tji kina.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: makuda sun?
makoda son?
valauvau aken, a ru ma binziu aken.
valaovao aken, a ro ma binzio aken.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: malingac a ku ulu.
malingac a ko olo.
sau iladju sa su kemebun.
sao iladjo sa so kemebon.
sinsi, sae'tju sa ku tjiyalj, ma binziu aken.
sinsi, sae'tjo sa ko tjiyalj, ma binzio aken.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: sau, kerimu.
sao, kerimo.
makaya ken na vaik a milima?
makaya ken na vaik a milima?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: aru patjezuanga a tja zikan, mai yanang.
aro patjezoanga a tja zikan, mai yanang.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: sinsi, sae'tju sa ku ulu, kiatju' aken nu na itjau anga.
sinsi, sae'tjo sa ko olo, kiatjo' aken no na itjao anga.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: uwi, kipa paulingavu a tjalju tjuma'.
owi, kipa paolingavo a tjaljo tjoma'.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: sinsi, puri kiyadju' aken nu tjaivelilj, nu siciyi aru kipucemel aken.
sinsi, pori kiyadjo' aken no tjaivelilj, no siciyi aro kipocemel aken.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: uwi, kipa paulingavu.
owi, kipa paolingavo.
ainu tji selep?
aino tji selep?
sae'tju a tjiyal ni selep, vaik a ma binziu.
sae'tjo a tjiyal ni selep, vaik a ma binzio.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: ainu tji sulja?
aino tji solja?
sinsi, sae'tju a liqu ni sulja, ikana mantjez.
sinsi, sae'tjo a liqo ni solja, ikana mantjez.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, sulja has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: ku ikana mantjez tji remereman?
ko ikana mantjez tji remereman?
maculju tjimadju.
macoljo tjimadjo.
pasemalavi amen tu tjimasun.
pasemalavi amen to tjimason.
lja pakedavi a tji selep aken, izuanga tapulu' aku cavilj.
lja pakedavi a tji selep aken, izoanga tapolo' ako cavilj.
S.TRANSL: 我叫pakedavi a tji selep，我今年10歲。
My name is pakedavi a tji selep, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: tjima su ngadan?
tjima so ngadan?
tjiaken lja pakedavi a tji sulja.
tjiaken lja pakedavi a tji solja.
S.TRANSL: My name is pakedvai a tji sulja.

S.FORM: anema su zukuan?
anema so zokoan?

S.FORM: kacalisiyan aken.
kacalisiyan aken.
kacalisian angauta a su matjaljaljak?
kacalisian angaota a so matjaljaljak?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: uwi, kacalisian amen na mapuljat.
owi, kacalisian amen na mapoljat.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是排灣族人。
Yes, my whole family is Paiwan.

S.FORM: kacalisian a su matjljaljak?
kacalisian a so matjljaljak?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: yini', amin tji kama a kacaljsiyan, tji kina paran.
yini', amin tji kama a kacaljsiyan, tji kina paran.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是排灣族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Paiwan, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: nimasun a aljak?
nimason a aljak?
aljak aken ni gusiu.
aljak aken ni gosio.
tji tjama a zua? pida anga cavilj ni tjama?
tji tjama a zoa? pida anga cavilj ni tjama?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: tji kama izuanga unem katu pulu' a cavilj.
tji kama izoanga onem kato polo' a cavilj.
tji tjama a zua? pida anga cavilj ni tjama?
tji tjama a zoa? pida anga cavilj ni tjama?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: ini', azu nia vuljuvuljun i inaljan, izuanga aluapulu'acavilj ni madju.
ini', azo nia voljovoljon i inaljan, izoanga aloapolo'acavilj ni madjo.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: pidanga cavilj ni su kaka?
pidanga cavilj ni so kaka?
tji kaka izuanga tapulu' katu alu a cavilj.
tji kaka izoanga tapolo' kato alo a cavilj.
tjavuljun tu liauv a cacvlj ni su kaka tja nusun?
tjavoljon to liaov a cacvlj ni so kaka tja noson?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: tjaljaljak aken tu lima cavilj tjai madju.
tjaljaljak aken to lima cavilj tjai madjo.
padanga su kina aca?
padanga so kina aca?
izua taidai katu sepatj a pulu' aku kina aca.
izoa taidai kato sepatj a polo' ako kina aca.
cuwai yanga ikatjen na micevun, matju muaca anga sun?
cowai yanga ikatjen na micevon, matjo moaca anga son?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: uwi, muacanga aken tu taidi katu tjelu a pulu'.
owi, moacanga aken to taidi kato tjelo a polo'.
matu mureqe angasun?
mato moreqe angason?
ini', pasaljusun apacun.
ini', pasaljoson apacon.
mukuljai anga sun?
mokoljai anga son?
ini', mureqe a nga ken.
ini', moreqe a nga ken.
mukural anga sun?
mokoral anga son?
uwi, mukural angaken tu tjielua pulju'.
owi, mokoral angaken to tjieloa poljo'.
aru mainu sun?
aro maino son?
aru vaik' aken a ma pankunse a kimin tjia sinsi.
aro vaik' aken a ma pankonse a kimin tjia sinsi.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: aru mainu sun sulja?
aro maino son solja?
aru vaik' a venulju' tua cemel tji madju.
aro vaik' a venoljo' toa cemel tji madjo.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: ainu tji patjer?
aino tji patjer?
izua i ljaljanguwiyan tji pantjer, aru kiyan a pisai tua ljemangwi tjimadju.
izoa i ljaljangowiyan tji pantjer, aro kiyan a pisai toa ljemangwi tjimadjo.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: izai nu tji selep? aru mekelj anga tji madju nu sauni.
izai no tji selep? aro mekelj anga tji madjo no saoni.
S.TRANSL: selep在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is selep? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: izua i kakaepuan tji madju, ku kimau.
izoa i kakaepoan tji madjo, ko kimao.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: vaiki a ma ngndjuvan.
vaiki a ma ngndjovan.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: vaik nan aken a veneli tua ku cengelj, ku kimau anga sun nu sauni.
vaik nan aken a veneli toa ko cengelj, ko kimao anga son no saoni.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: vaiki a emalju ta bintu!
vaiki a emaljo ta binto!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: kimitua aliali, aru vaik' aken na kimim tjai sinsi.
kimitoa aliali, aro vaik' aken na kimim tjai sinsi.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: tucu a adau aru kian tji gusiu tua cuiciu?
toco a adao aro kian tji gosio toa coicio?
S.TRANSL: Is gusiu competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: ini', aru kiyan tji madju tua midjuruk.
ini', aro kiyan tji madjo toa midjorok.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: nu ngndjukaidjukai izua rusu kianing?
no ngndjokaidjokai izoa roso kianing?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: uei, aru kian aken a mekelj.
oei, aro kian aken a mekelj.
nu ngndjukaidjukai izua rusu kianing?
no ngndjokaidjokai izoa roso kianing?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: aru kiyan aken tua cuiciu.
aro kiyan aken toa coicio.
anema aru tja kudaing nu ngndukaidukai?
anema aro tja kodaing no ngndokaidokai?

What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: aru kian namen tua mavaviljevilevilj.
aro kian namen toa mavaviljevilevilj.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: aru paveli tjen tua kakanen nu ungndjukaidjukai?
aro paveli tjen toa kakanen no ongndjokaidjokai?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: ini', paveli tjen tua abubun.
ini', paveli tjen toa abobon.
kacimas sun, pasa makya sun a rac!
kacimas son, pasa makya son a rac!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: maljimalji.
maljimalji.
i tjuma' tji vuvu?
i tjoma' tji vovo?
izua na tae'd i tua aqerengang njimadju?
izoa na tae'd i toa aqerengang njimadjo?
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: izua tji vuvu i tjuma'?
izoa tji vovo i tjoma'?
neka' ri .tjau vaivaik. nu masuljem anga ki pantjez.
neka' ri .tjao vaivaik. no masoljem anga ki pantjez.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: izua tji vuvu i tjuma'?
izoa tji vovo i tjoma'?
iazui nikai. sau ljivavau a kiminm.
iazoi nikai. sao ljivavao a kiminm.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: izua a caucau a caucau i tjuma'?
izoa a caocao a caocao i tjoma'?
sulja cuai angaken na ini' ka pacun tja nusun na suljivatje sun?
solja coai angaken na ini' ka pacon tja noson na soljivatje son?
S.TRANSL: 是sulja阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s sulja. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: ui na suljivat a ken.vaca' aken na ljimizau tja nusun.
oi na soljivat a ken.vaca' aken na ljimizao tja noson.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: mai nu tji tjama?
mai no tji tjama?
izaua i kakesan ku djau lau.
izaoa i kakesan ko djao lao.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: manu tji selep.
mano tji selep.
vai ka sema pukukan a djemekep ta kuka.
vai ka sema pokokan a djemekep ta koka.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: vuvu mantjez anga men.
vovo mantjez anga men.
neka' i tjuma' tja suvuvu izua i vavua kaljavu i tjuma'.
neka' i tjoma' tja sovovo izoa i vavoa kaljavo i tjoma'.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: matjez anga sun ayau kama i palan.
matjez anga son ayao kama i palan.
cuai a ngaken ini' ka pacun tja nusun. meaca anga sun.
coai a ngaken ini' ka pacon tja noson. meaca anga son.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: melevatjin a pacun tja nusun.
melevatjin a pacon tja noson.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: za sa panguralj se'tju a pasa pinsan.
za sa pangoralj se'tjo a pasa pinsan.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: cuai a ngasun a ini'ka kivala ku aivuau tjaiza sa tjen a matjvetjevel a kaiv.
coai a ngason a ini'ka kivala ko aivoao tjaiza sa tjen a matjvetjevel a kaiv.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: pumayanga tjemekel a ken ta ucia ka mesen iladi sa tja mare aivuivu.
pomayanga tjemekel a ken ta ocia ka mesen iladi sa tja mare aivoivo.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: maljimalji aru tjuma' anga aken.
maljimalji aro tjoma' anga aken.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: tjau kinesakesa aicu a kuka kacu sa su kanin i tjuma'.
tjao kinesakesa aico a koka kaco sa so kanin i tjoma'.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: makaya tjen a micevun nuna itjau anga nu tiyau.
makaya tjen a micevon nona itjao anga no tiyao.
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: nakeya izai nu?
nakeya izai no?
i tania gaku puri pasan angamen.
i tania gako pori pasan angamen.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: i ta na kaka'puan kau maya aru na kemacalisiyanan aken.
i ta na kaka'poan kao maya aro na kemacalisiyanan aken.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: nguangua' a inhua ita na inaljan nu kalja mauragan kelju anga.
ngoangoa' a inhoa ita na inaljan no kalja maoragan keljo anga.
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: nu ka lja veveanga nanga cuai a ravac.
no ka lja veveanga nanga coai a ravac.
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: keljuangan nu masalud nu maya.
keljoangan no masalod no maya.
S.TRANSL: 那你收穫祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Harvest Festival!

S.FORM: ui numaya.
oi nomaya.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: aku sun na kicepeliu a ma inaljan.
ako son na kicepelio a ma inaljan.
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: aru kisane sinsi aken.
aro kisane sinsi aken.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: aku in' i paran a pasupu.
ako in' i paran a pasopo.
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: ayatua sengnelit a ken taku inaljan puri pacikel aken ta ku picul.
ayatoa sengnelit a ken tako inaljan pori pacikel aken ta ko picol.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: macau su a teminun tjima na tumulu?
macao so a teminon tjima na tomolo?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: tji vuvuv tja lecauan tji madju i inaljan a trminun.
tji vovov tja lecaoan tji madjo i inaljan a trminon.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: ku su na puvarun a kicauan.
ko so na povaron a kicaoan.
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: ulja pacusu ai cu a tja kakudan a yaken.
olja pacoso ai co a tja kakodan a yaken.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: sangnuua' aravac ai cu a vava.
sangnooa' aravac ai co a vava.
tjiaken a na masensen.
tjiaken a na masensen.
anema nu su cauan aru cuai nu sema vava.
anema no so caoan aro coai no sema vava.
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: maka pitju a adau makayangna.
maka pitjo a adao makayangna.
S.TRANSL: No, it only takes about a week.

S.FORM: anema su si paveliveli?
anema so si paveliveli?
izua silji kata ljakiu. tjiaken a na temalem!
izoa silji kata ljakio. tjiaken a na temalem!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: pida a rusa?
pida a rosa?
rusaidai katu lima pulu'.
rosaidai kato lima polo'.
tjengelai aken taicu a kava. pida?
tjengelai aken taico a kava. pida?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: limaidai.
limaidai.
pazangal paka madeleu?
pazangal paka madeleo?
S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: aljai nu tjamadele aru sunsuru aken.
aljai no tjamadele aro sonsoro aken.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: pai numaya. azua ucencenl paka itau.
pai nomaya. azoa ocencenl paka itao.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: puri veneli aken ta vakal kataicu a tjaljuljis.
pori veneli aken ta vakal kataico a tjaljoljis.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: rusa kuzul. kusi na lima a mesensen. makaya a sikuda a cuai.
rosa kozol. kosi na lima a mesensen. makaya a sikoda a coai.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: ku ali a na siukai ta nu aken a mamaza. makaya tjama djele.
ko ali a na siokai ta no aken a mamaza. makaya tjama djele.
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: makaya.
makaya.
kelju kelju samazau a pacun. izua kava a tjalupun izu penuljat.
keljo keljo samazao a pacon. izoa kava a tjalopon izo penoljat.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: pida aicu a kava?
pida aico a kava?
a kava nu ita tjiluaidai katu tapulju' nutjelu takuzul.
a kava no ita tjiloaidai kato tapoljo' notjelo takozol.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: veneli aken paka ita ke lan ta va'uan.
veneli aken paka ita ke lan ta va'oan.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: djavadjavai.puri veneli aken ta djuaidjuai kata linatu ta makau a vutjulj.
djavadjavai.pori veneli aken ta djoaidjoai kata linato ta makao a votjolj.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: maka pavelianganken ta kinsa. izuanan a cuniupin, veneli sun?
maka pavelianganken ta kinsa. izoanan a coniopin, veneli son?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: pai nu maya veneli aken tua ita. nu tjai veliljangan veneliangan ken ta kinsa.
pai no maya veneli aken toa ita. no tjai veliljangan veneliangan ken ta kinsa.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: uwi. ku cavuau. limapulu'.
owi. ko cavoao. limapolo'.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
